demo.title: Translation demo
demo.text: This is a simple demonstration app for ngx-translate

type.enduro_text: Join a enduro race, 15 minutes time frame, use the Fast fuel you've set up, and compete agains oponents in real time! The more cars you put on a race, the more money you can win.

race.increase_win1: Increase your chances to win, buy some tokens
race.increase_win2: and get access to more features like:
race.ticker_frozen: We experienced a ticker feed loss during the race which invalidates the race and prize pool. Your bets were returned for your next race.

shared.what_you_do: What would you like to do?

profile.ticket_info: Ticket has a value 1 IOI and you can use him to 1 IOI races
profile.why_resend: To withdrawal tokens you must be registered 7days on the platform, and you have to verify your account.

tutorial.skip_desc: No worries, you can still turn the tutorial on in the settings anytime.
tutorial.tutorial_msg1: We prepared a short tutorial for you
tutorial.tutorial_msg3: See all Races, set up your favourite ones, see chat or your profile details in the menu on the right side.
tutorial.tutorial_msg5: See your Rewards progress, Leaderboard, Tip of the day from your team manager and next burning date in the left menu.
tutorial.tutorial_msg7: You can find NFTs, Teams and detailed Stats in the main Middle panel.

text.free: Try your luck for FREE and learn how to play! This is a never-ending opportunity to win 10 TRX every 10 minutes. Your car speed will depend on the performance of the chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.
text.trx10: You can participate in this race for a bet of 10 TRX to win up to 1,000 TRX which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.
text.trx50: You can participate in this race for a bet of 50 TRX to win up to 5,000 TRX which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.
text.trx100: You can participate in this race for a bet of 100 TRX to win up to 10,000 TRX which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.
text.trx500: You can participate in this race for a bet of 500 TRX to win up to 50,000 TRX which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.
text.trx1000: You can participate in this race for a bet of 1 000 TRX to win up to 100,000 TRX which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.

bonus_race.bonus_text: Prize pool for the bonus race is based on the 10% TRX value of IOI tokens sold in one month. Only those users who have held enough IOI tokens in the previous month will be allowed to enter this race.

text.wednesday_race: Join the Party Race every Wednesday for free! Get the guaranteed prize pool together with the SPECIAL EDITION cars! We will celebrate different anniversaries every Wednesday and a new unique car will be available for you to win. Collect them and let them increase in value like a good investment and win guaranteed 10,000 TRX on top of that. To participate in this race, you only need to be a holder of IOI tokens. The number of cars you can enter the race with depends on how many IOI tokens you hold before the race starts.
text.tournament: Accept the challenge, take your racing to the next level, act like the champ and become the winner. This is the tournament for the best of the best. Guaranteed largest prize pool ever is waiting for the champion at the end of the tournament. The race starts every hour and you will go through the 10 mad races to collect points. The best 10 racers advance into the next level where another 9 rounds of madness are waiting for you to prove your skills. After every race is one racer out and this phase-out will reveal only one true winner to grab the huge prize pool. The minimum amount of participants is 10.
text.free_tournament: Win 1,000 TRX and 0,001 BTC once a day every day for free! The tournament starts every 12 hours where you can win either TRX or BTC. To participate in this race, you only need to be a holder of IOI tokens. The number of cars you can enter the race with depends on how many IOI tokens you hold before the race starts.
text.golden_ticket: Join Golden Ticket Race EVERY HOUR FOR FREE to win the ticket to the awesome Golden Race 24H with a guaranteed prize pool of minimum 2,000 TRX even up to 100,000 TRX.
text.golden_race: Join Golden Race 1H. Use your ticket you won in Golden Ticket race or bet 1,000 TRX  to win a guaranteed prize pool of a minimum 2,000 TRX or more. Even up to 100,000 TRX! Put more cars into the race and get a better chance to win.

rewards.bonus_race_text: Prize pool for the bonus race is based on the 10% TRX value of IOI tokens sold in one month.  Only those users who have held enough IOI tokens in the previous month will be allowed to enter this race. Please check the bonus race table in the whitepaper.
rewards.team_bonus_text: Top teams and top players in those teams will split the 5% monhtly betting turnover bonus.
rewards.item_bonus_text: 10% of the turnover of all sold or rented cars will be paid in IOI tokens to all users holding 1.000 IOI tokens or more in their Wallets in the previous month.
rewards.luxury_bonus_text: 3% of all turnover will be paid once a month in TRX tokens for holders who had more than 10 000 IOI tokens in their wallets throughout the previous month

text.hint11_text: Everyone who is actively playing and reffering their friends onto the platform earn 2% - 4% from affiliate winnings... Thats what I call a steady online income... play and earn money playing online games!
text.hint12_text: We have a very unique HALL OF FAME... once you get there there is no turning back... Life Time Pasive Income is waiting for you! Every holder of 10 000 IOI tokens splits 1% of the platforms turnover, paid monthly... forever..
text.ioi1_text: You can participate in this race for a bet of 1 IOI  to win up to 100 IOI which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.
text.ioi3_text: You can participate in this race for a bet of 3 IOI  to win up to 300 IOI which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.
text.ioi5_text: You can participate in this race for a bet of 5 IOI  to win up to 500 IOI which is 100 times more! Your car speed will depend on the performance of chosen crypto to fuel up with. Either give it a go like a pro, predict market a fuel up yourself or use the automatic function to fuel up with just one click. More cars you have in one race, a better chance to win you get.

modals.crypto_text: Enter your correct senders a crypto address
modals.warning_text: Please DO NOT use exhanges to send funds. Crypto can be sent only from personal wallets
modals.crypto_min_text: Send crypto to this adress within 20 minutes
modals.what_is_crypto: What is your crypto wallet address?
modals.withdraw_limit_text: Safety is our priority, you can withdraw any time once per day.
modals.dont_share_text: Remember do not share your passkey with anyone.
modals.this_is_auth: This is were you write your authenticator code.
modals.processing_msg: Processing, please wait, it takes few seconds
modals.with_soon: Withdrawal of this coin is coming soon. You can exchange your crypto to TRX and withdrawall instantly.

deposit_modal.welcome_here: Welcome, here you can deposit crypto to your profile.
deposit_modal.what_receive: What do you want to receive?
deposit_modal.choose_receive: Choose a crypto coin you want to receive
deposit_modal.click_warning: Please click confirm once the transaction is sent
deposit_modal.copy_address: Copy this game address and paste it your external wallet to receive funds.
deposit_modal.fee_warning: Blockchain transaction and Coinswitch fees may be deducted from you deposit.
deposit_modal.add_note: Please add this note to your deposit
deposit_modal.time_text1: Tik-Tok, you have 20 minutes to receive crypto to this address.
deposit_modal.time_text2: Please send it soon otherwise this transaction will be cancelled.
deposit_modal.crypto_from: This is the crypto wallet address that you will be sending the funds from.
deposit_modal.address_warning: Make sure you will use this address to send transaction, otherwise your transaction will be lost.

exchange_modal.info_text: Here you can exchange your crypto to TRX.
exchange_modal.from_text: Crypto coin that you want to exchange.
exchange_modal.to_text: Crypto coin that you are exchangig to.
exchange_modal.no_exchange: You need to deposit this coin first, to be able to make an exchange.

with_modal.welcome_here: Welcome, here you can send crypto to your external wallet.
with_modal.what_withdraw: What do you want to withdraw?
with_modal.choose_withdraw: Choose a crypto coin to withdraw
with_modal.crypto_to: This is the crypto wallet address that you will be sending the funds to.
with_modal.address_warning: Make sure you will use correct address, otherwise your transaction will be lost.
with_modal.cond1: Your withdrawals are limited to 1x per day and the minimum amount is 100 TRX.

transfer_modal.welcome_here: Welcome. Here you can transfer your crypto between your game wallet and your Nitro wallet. (With the IOI registration you also received a full-fledged crypto wallet called Nitro. It is a great way to keep, send and receive crypto coins all around the world and its especially made for gaming.)
transfer_modal.what_transfer: What do you want to transfer?
transfer_modal.choose_transfer: Choose a crypto coin to transfer
transfer_modal.transfer_info: Transfer is unlimited and without any fees.

gift_modal.what_gift: What kind of gift do you want to send?

garage.nft_desc: Non-Fungible Tokens are virtual tokens minted on the blockchain for digital scarcity, security, and authenticity. They are unique, indivisible, and non-interchangeable.

join.benefit1_text: Help your team win and receive a team turnover bonus. TOP 10 racers split the reward.
join.benefit2_text: Become an affiliate, bring new players on the platform and receive unique rewards for every person.
join.benefit3_text: Set up a strategy to win all races. See the best performing coins in the last 10 minutes to always fuel the best of the best.
join.benefit4_text: IOI holders can create individual teams. Be the leader that they look up to. Invite your friends to create a following that will rule them all.
join.benefit5_text: Finish your daily tasks and earn your bonuses! Become premium member and earn 3x more.
join.choose_memb: Choose a membership and join a team today!
join.memb_starts: Your membership will start on the 1st of
join.create_team_text1: Create your dream team and share profits with family and friends. Help everyone to achieve the top 10 in position in a race to get team points. The top 3 teams split 5% of the total platform turnover as their bonus. Moon rider with the biggest portfolio gain during one race, will receive a special bonus reward. To own a team,
join.create_team_text2: hold at least a thousand IOI tokens.
join.create_team_text3: Invite new users to your team and create a real following, real tribe! Team membership is valid automatically from

modals.join_free: Join a team without any advantages

modals.new_member2: new one starts on the 1st of

my_team.page_info: Be the support your team needs, be the boss everyone loves. Decide who you make the manager or even a team co-owner.
my_team.top_text3: of your team? Start your races and challenge with your teammates and
my_team.enjoy_tournament: Enjoy yourself in a special team tournament, race with the best teams on the platform and win up to 50 000 TRX
my_team.tip_desc: Check out the tip of the day from your manager and use it in your next race!
my_team.add_tip: Add manager tip of the day
my_team.choose_tip: Choose three coins you want to recommend to your team as a Tip of the day

d_tasks.top_text: Every day, you can earn a reward by completing different tasks. Receive IOI tokens that you can use to play FREE games and win TRX or join tournaments for special prizes that only IOI holders can enter. Be part of a revolutionary staking program, get as many IOI tokens as you can.
d_tasks.golden_info: Does not apply if you use golden ticket to enter the race, only applies for regular TRX entry.

leaderboard.page_info: Get a premium team membership, and unlock the access to the best performing fuel. Create strategies and become a leader.
leaderboard.empty: There are no data in this leaderboard so far
leaderboard.owner_leaderboard_info: Become an owner and build your own imperium of NFTs

owners_managers.page_info: To become a Manager of any teams, you need to hold at least 1 000 IOI tokens. To become an Owner, pay 1 000 IOI tokens.

owners_managers.manager-benefit3: Set up a Trading strategy for your racers

affiliate.page_info: Invite people via your unique link and level up your income with IOI affiliate program.
affiliate.name: Name
affiliate.champion_text: To get to this level, turn over at least 5000 IOI tokens. To keep it, attend at least three paid races in a week. You will get 2% from turnover of your affiliates.
affiliate.rookie_text: The easiest way to build your online income by playing crypto games. No maintenance, no fees. You will get 0.5% from turnover of your affiliates.
affiliate.racer_text: To get to this level, turn over at least 1000 IOI tokens. To keep it, attend at least two paid races in a week. You will get 1,5% from turnover of your affiliates.
affiliate.flash_text: To get to this level, turn over at least 50 IOI tokens. To keep it, attend at least one paid race in a week. You will get 1% from turnover of your affiliates.

nitro_notifiq.buy_car: Buy a new car and enter more races at the same time
nitro_notifiq.bought_car: You have bought a new car!
nitro_notifiq.rented_car: You have rented a new car!
nitro_notifiq.free_car: You just have got a free car!
nitro_notifiq.fuel_tutorial_text1: Good job, you are only few steps away from your first race. Your job now is to choose one of your cars by clicking on it.
nitro_notifiq.fuel_tutorial_text2: You are in fueling part now. Your job is to choose 3 best performing coins. Simply click on the button labeled with 'LUCKY FUEL' text.
nitro_notifiq.fuel_tutorial_text3: Now you can see all of the available coins. Click on three of them that you like the most and hit the Confirm button.
nitro_notifiq.fuel_tutorial_text4: Awesome! Now you just have to drag the slider button next to each coin to fuel it at your will. If you are a seasoned player, click on Random button and your car will be fueled randomly.
nitro_notifiq.fuel_tutorial_text5: You have just entered the last step of this tutorial. Here you can see the summary of the race that you are entering and your car.
nitro_notifiq.fuel_tutorial_text6: You can also enter multiple races at once with the same bet by clicking on multibet button! However if you are okey with everything, just hit the play button and enter the race!
nitro_notifiq.fuel_correct: Fuel a mix of at least 3 coins.  Min 5%, max 90% in each. Fill up your tank to 100%
nitro_notifiq.no_aval_cars: You have no available race car for this race
nitro_notifiq.valid_text: Please choose amount, and token type.
nitro_notifiq.succ_deposit: Successfull. We are waiting for your deposit now.
nitro_notifiq.with_confirm: Confirm your withdrawal in your email address. Safety is our priority, you can withdraw any time once per day. Remember do not share you passkey with anyone
nitro_notifiq.did_you_know: Did you know: You can earn money with affiliate section?
nitro_notifiq.tutorial_finished: Tutorial has finished!', 'Welcome to the race  you should see the count down to the start. You can leave and enter this screen anytime just click the IOI logo to exit this screen.
nitro_notifiq.prove_skills: Prove yourself how skilled you are. Join race and show others who is the champion.
nitro_notifiq.team_member: You are now part of team!
nitro_notifiq.first_join: You have to join team first.
nitro_notifiq.open_link_follow: Please open your email and get your verifycation code, to reset the password.
nitro_notifiq.sucess_redirect: Success! You will be redirected to login.
nitro_notifiq.open_mail: Please open your registered email account, and follow the link

favourite_cars.page_info: Get your cars on the track as soon as possible. Set up your fast fuel, and win more.
